title: Critical thinking: making sure of facts
creator_credit: Coronet Instructional Films and Dick Larson
brief_description: Timely topics dealing with reading, listening and television viewing help demonstrate how to evaluate the facts about a particular situation. This involves knowing whether information is based on an eye-witness or secondary account, checking the sources of information, and assessing the skills and knowledge of the source.
